db:abstract.db:para: The Media Player example uses the Microsoft Media Player ActiveX control to implement a functional media player application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += widgets axcontainer
HEADERS = mediaaxwidget.h SOURCES = main.cpp FORMS = mainwindow.ui
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/activeqt/mediaplayer INSTALLS += target
